label: Jazz Music
description: Music genre characterized by swing and blue notes, improvisation, and a strong rhythm section.

subcategories.label: Jazz Instruments
subcategories.description: Musical instruments commonly used in jazz music.

subcategories.label: Jazz Artists
subcategories.description: Famous musicians who have contributed to the development of jazz music.

subcategories.label: Jazz Music Merchandise
subcategories.description: Products related to jazz music, such as vinyl records, posters, and books.
